entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.3°C

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
